Package interfaces

Interface iPatientService

public interface iPatientService
Interface for managing patient-related operations in the system. This interface defines methods for retrieving patient information, managing appointments, and updating contact information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    cancelAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID)
    Cancels an existing appointment for a patient.
    boolean
    createAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, LocalDateTime appointmentDate)
    Creates a new appointment for a patient with a specified doctor.
    Appointment[]
    getPatientAppointments(String patientID)
    Retrieves all appointments for a specified patient.
    Patient
    getPatientById(String hospitalID)
    Retrieves the details of a patient using their hospital ID.
    void
    listAllPatients()
    Lists all patients in the system.
    boolean
    rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID, LocalDateTime newDate)
    Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient.
    boolean
    updatePatientContact(String hospitalID, String newContactInformation)
    Updates the contact information of a specified patient.

  • Method Details

    • getPatientById

      Patient getPatientById(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves the details of a patient using their hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      The patient object corresponding to the provided ID, or null if no patient is found.

    • updatePatientContact

      boolean updatePatientContact(String hospitalID, String newContactInformation)
      Updates the contact information of a specified patient.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      newContactInformation - The new contact information to be updated (e.g., phone number or email).
      Returns:
      true if the contact information was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • listAllPatients

      void listAllPatients()
      Lists all patients in the system. This method retrieves and displays the details of all registered patients.

    • getPatientAppointments

      Appointment[] getPatientAppointments(String patientID)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specified patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      An array of Appointment objects for the specified patient, or an empty array if no appointments are found.

    • createAppointment

      boolean createAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, LocalDateTime appointmentDate)
      Creates a new appointment for a patient with a specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      appointmentDate - The date and time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      boolean cancelAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID)
      Cancels an existing appointment for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      boolean rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID, LocalDateTime newDate)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      newDate - The new date and time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.
